ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] UseFUL songs...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi!  Chant and Anthem don t stack.  But Anthem and Johnathan s Whistling Warsong do. I just thought of a use for Melliflous Motion...never tried it (you must
ygData.messageBody:
Hi! Chant and Anthem don't stack. But Anthem and Johnathan's Whistling
Warsong do.

I just thought of a use for Melliflous Motion...never tried it (you must be
21 RL years or older to attempt part of this...hehe). First you get drunk.
Then, get your character drunk. Get together a group of fellow (21 yr or
older of course) drunkards, and just start playing it. If you get out of
effect range, attempt to return in range. Better yet, if you can get
multiple bards in the group to all play this song, slightly staggered.

*poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poo
f**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**p
oof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof**poof*

Heh..on just the first 3 pulses. :P

I'm sure the sight of several drunken people randomly stumbling about then
suddenly poofing would be fun for a while! For participants and spectators
alike!

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 28, 2001 11:22 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] UseFUL songs...


Instead of listing ways in which songs are useless, let's talk about how to
use different songs. I haven't played a bard in a long time, and there's a
whole lotta new songs out there - so I'd like to know which songs will be
useful in which ways and combinations.
So.... as a starter,

1st Level - Chant of Battle:
The first (and for a while, most useful), it's sung in combat - but since
it's not harmful, it should be sung at all times during a young bard's
early life until they've maxed out their singing skills. It enhances
combat abilities for the Bard and everyone in their group, and can be
successfully twisted / stacked / harmonized with most other below-tenth
songs. It becomes outdated with the tenth level song: "Anthem de Arms"
(can it still be stacked with that, though?)

Talies the Wanderer
